Not at the moment. There has been talk about making this an option, but no
=
concrete plans last time I heard. I think people were unsure how you could
=
best utilize 1.1 connections. I.e. how do you download multiple documents i=
n
one connections with the current Heritrix framework. You either need to a=
dd
a mechanism for maintaining connections or process URIs (from the same h=
ost)
in batches, rather then one at a time. Either approach requires seriou=
s
changes to the Heritrix framework. 
 
- Kris
